item.title: 2019-06-05: The English Lesson
item.description: I took an English conversation lesson, it’s the first time I came back from my honeymoon. I have visited England, Scotland, Canada and America in my honeymoon, so I thought that my English skill improve a little bit maybe, but it’s not at all. I will study English harder than before so I can work abroad. Of course, I want to enjoy studying English. It’s said, “what one likes, one will do well.
